==Chinese==

===Etymology===
Based on a story in "The Circling Sky", in ''[[w:Zhuangzi (book)|Zhuangzi]]'' ({{lang|zh|《莊子·天運》}}). Xishi ({{zh-l|西施*}}), a famous beauty in Chinese history, often frowned because of her heart disease. The ugly Dongshi ({{zh-l|東施*}}) of the same village imitated Xishi to try to be as beautiful as Xishi, but in turn made herself uglier and scared away the villagers.
